name: Update a book
description:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
  as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.
descriptionHtml:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
And I have some unique data of a book
Given a book exists in the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1744919571, title=This Side of Paradise, description=Voluptas accusantium mollitia., pageCount=1023, excerpt=Aperiam et impedit quia nobis. Quibusdam dolor sit in et adipisci quia. Aut eligendi eveniet laborum esse. Hic omnis ullam ut et. Fuga non sed tempore natus fugit qui., publishDate=2025-09-20T16:42:23.633646825Z]

steps.name: When I change selected information of that book

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1744919571, title=This Side of Paradise (2nd ed.), description=Voluptas accusantium mollitia., pageCount=1024, excerpt=Aperiam et impedit quia nobis. Quibusdam dolor sit in et adipisci quia. Aut eligendi eveniet laborum esse. Hic omnis ullam ut et. Fuga non sed tempore natus fugit qui., publishDate=2025-09-20T16:42:23.633646825Z]

steps.name: Then the updated information about the book is visible to users
